pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Gaussian Graphical Modeling with Variable Clustering // Perform sparse estimation of a Gaussian graphical model (GGM) with node aggregation through variable clustering. Currently, the package implements the clusterpath estimator of the Gaussian graphical model (CGGM) (Touw, Alfons, Groenen Wilms, 2025; doi:10.48550/arXiv.2407.00644).
